docs.text: Welcome The full documentation for the project imxnoobx.xyz . What is a REST api? A REST API (also known as RESTful API) is an application programming interface (API or web API) that conforms to the constraints of REST architectural style and allows for interaction with RESTful web services. REST stands for representational state transfer and was created by computer scientist Roy Fielding. More info in redhat.com

docs.text: dis-logs This is my first npm package! I was in my way to learn node.js. It can be use for loging your bots through a discord wenhook! You can download it from ​here​ ​How to install ​ npm install dis-logs ​Install the package by running the command in your terminal.
docs.title: Discord Logger

docs.text: This is my first npm package! I was in my way to learn node.js. It can be use for loging your bots through a discord wenhook! You can download it from ​here​
docs.title: dis-logs

docs.text: ​Install the package by running the command in your terminal.
docs.title: ​npm install dis-logs

docs.text: How To Use This package usage its very simple and you only need to have node.js and npm installed. Follow step by step the instructions in the next step! Example index.js ​ const ​ { ​ Webhook ​ } ​ = ​ ​ require ​ ( ​ "​dis-logs​" ​ ) ​ const ​ ​ logger ​ ​ = ​ ​ new ​ ​ Webhook ​ ( ​ "​YOUR_WEBHOOK​" ​ ); ​ logger ​ . ​ setName ​ ( ​ "​WEBHOOK_NAME​" ​ ) ​ logger ​ . ​ setAV ​ ( ​ "​​WEBHOOK_AVATAR​" ​ ) ​ // ​https://onlinejpgtools.com/convert-jpg-to-base64 ​ //​ you can use any of this options ​ logger ​ . console ( "This log only will be printed in the Terminal!" ) ​ logger ​ . success ( "This will be sent with a green success color" ) ​ logger ​ . warn ( "This will be sent with a yellow warn color" ) ​ logger ​ . error ( "This will be sent with a red error color" ) ​ logger ​ . send ( "This will be sent without any color" )
docs.title: Information

docs.text: This package usage its very simple and you only need to have node.js and npm installed. Follow step by step the instructions in the next step!
docs.title: How To Use

docs.text: index.js ​ const ​ { ​ Webhook ​ } ​ = ​ ​ require ​ ( ​ "​dis-logs​" ​ ) ​ const ​ ​ logger ​ ​ = ​ ​ new ​ ​ Webhook ​ ( ​ "​YOUR_WEBHOOK​" ​ ); ​ logger ​ . ​ setName ​ ( ​ "​WEBHOOK_NAME​" ​ ) ​ logger ​ . ​ setAV ​ ( ​ "​​WEBHOOK_AVATAR​" ​ ) ​ // ​https://onlinejpgtools.com/convert-jpg-to-base64 ​ //​ you can use any of this options ​ logger ​ . console ( "This log only will be printed in the Terminal!" ) ​ logger ​ . success ( "This will be sent with a green success color" ) ​ logger ​ . warn ( "This will be sent with a yellow warn color" ) ​ logger ​ . error ( "This will be sent with a red error color" ) ​ logger ​ . send ( "This will be sent without any color" )
docs.title: Example

docs.text: Instalation Download the package npm install -- save dis - logs Import Package index.js const { Webhook } = require ( 'dis-logs' ) Set Up Your Own Webhook const logger = new Webhook ( 'YOUR_WEBHOOK_URL' ) // (1) Check how you can get your own discord webhook here Customize your webhook Webhook Name The name is a string less than 34 characters logger . setName ( 'WEBHOOK_NAME' ) Webhook Icon You can create a webhook icon by generating a image with onlinejpgtools.com to base64 converter logger . setAV ( 'STRING_BASE64' ) // (1) You can create a webhook icon by generating a image with onlinejpgtools.com to base64 converter
docs.title: Instalation

docs.text: npm install -- save dis - logs
docs.title: Download the package

docs.text: index.js const { Webhook } = require ( 'dis-logs' )
docs.title: Import Package

docs.text: const logger = new Webhook ( 'YOUR_WEBHOOK_URL' ) // (1) Check how you can get your own discord webhook here
docs.title: Set Up Your Own Webhook

docs.text: The name is a string less than 34 characters logger . setName ( 'WEBHOOK_NAME' )
docs.title: Webhook Name

docs.text: You can create a webhook icon by generating a image with onlinejpgtools.com to base64 converter logger . setAV ( 'STRING_BASE64' ) // (1) You can create a webhook icon by generating a image with onlinejpgtools.com to base64 converter
docs.title: Webhook Icon

docs.text: Usage Log Events Success Example This will be sent with a green success color logger . success ( '' ) Warning Example This will be sent with a yellow warn color logger . warn ( '' ) Error Example This will be sent with a red error color logger . error ( '' ) Normal Example This will be sent without any color logger . send ( '' ) Local Example This will be printed just in the terminal logger ​ . console ( ​ '' ​ )

docs.text: Rest Api Usage (Under Development) Base URL api.imxnoobx.xyz Protocol / Port Protocol: https Port: 443 Api Method Endpoint Response Status GET /discord/user/%{userid} JSON GET /discord/server/%{serverid} JSON GET /steam/user/%{steamid} JSON POST /scamlink JSON
docs.title: Restfull API

docs.text: Method Endpoint Response Status GET /discord/user/%{userid} JSON GET /discord/server/%{serverid} JSON GET /steam/user/%{steamid} JSON POST /scamlink JSON
docs.title: Api

docs.text: Discord Server Get information about a discord server! Request. GET GET http://api.imxnoobx.xyz/discord/server/000078108977594368 axios . get ( 'https://api.imxnoobx.xyz/discord/server/000078108977594368' ) . then ( e => { let r = e . data ; console . log ( r ) //Output }) Output. JSON Output example { "id" : "000078108977594368" , // Server ID "name" : "Discord Server" , "instant_invite" : null , "channels" : [ { "id" : "000000000000000" , // Cha nnel ID "name" : "Discord Channel" , "position" : 8 } ], "members" : [ { "id" : "0" , // Server Posi t io n ID , No t User ID "username" : "Wumpus" , "discriminator" : "0000" , "avatar" : null , "status" : "dnd" , "avatar_url" : "https://cdn.discordapp.com/widget-avatars/XXXXXXXXXXX" } ], "presence_count" : 465 // Amou nt o f users o nl i ne }

docs.text: Handling Errors Some info about handling errors! Error Code 404 Not Found The HTTP 404 Not Found response status code indicates that the server cannot find the requested resource. Links that lead to a 404 page are often called broken or dead links and can be subject to link rot . What Does It Mean in This API In case the error is when making the request to info endpoints (user/server) 1 , It will be commonly because the user does not exist or has not been found Error Code 500 Internal Server Error The HyperText Transfer Protocol (HTTP) 500 Internal Server Error server error response code indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. This error response is a generic "catch-all" response. Usually, this indicates the server cannot find a better 5xx error code to response. Sometimes, server administrators log error responses like the 500 status code with more details about the request to prevent the error from happening again in the future. What Does It Mean in This API Its broken or that endpoint is down for a couple of reasons This only affets endponts to where you ask for information ↩
docs.title: Error Handling

docs.text: The HyperText Transfer Protocol (HTTP) 500 Internal Server Error server error response code indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. This error response is a generic "catch-all" response. Usually, this indicates the server cannot find a better 5xx error code to response. Sometimes, server administrators log error responses like the 500 status code with more details about the request to prevent the error from happening again in the future.

docs.text: Scamlink Detector Check if the link has been blacklisted as scamlink. Request. POST POST http://api.imxnoobx.xyz/discord/user/652969127756955658 Content-Type: application/json { "link": "gift-nitro.events" } axios . post ( 'https://api.imxnoobx.xyz/scamlink' , { 'Content-Type' : 'application/json' , data : { "link" : "scamlink.scam" } }) . then ( e => { let r = e . data ; console . log ( r ) //Output }) Output. JSON Output example Scam Link Detected Scam Link Not Detected { "link" : "scamlink.scam" , "result" : true } { "link" : "scamlink.scam" , "result" : false }
docs.title: Scam Link Analyzer

docs.text: Check if the link has been blacklisted as scamlink.
docs.title: Scamlink Detector

docs.text: POST http://api.imxnoobx.xyz/discord/user/652969127756955658 Content-Type: application/json { "link": "gift-nitro.events" } axios . post ( 'https://api.imxnoobx.xyz/scamlink' , { 'Content-Type' : 'application/json' , data : { "link" : "scamlink.scam" } }) . then ( e => { let r = e . data ; console . log ( r ) //Output })
docs.title: Request. POST

docs.text: Output example Scam Link Detected Scam Link Not Detected { "link" : "scamlink.scam" , "result" : true } { "link" : "scamlink.scam" , "result" : false }
